headline: What Makes Vistra Corp. (VST) an Attractive Buy Amidst the Nuclear Renaissance
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is included among the 13 Best Nuclear Power Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is the largest competitive power generator in the US with a capacity of approximately 41,000 MW, powered by a diverse portfolio that includes natural gas, coal, nuclear, solar, and battery energy storage facilities. Vistra Corp. […]

headline: How Vistra's Texas Capacity Expansion and 20-Year Nuclear Deal Could Shape VST’s Investment Outlook
summary: On September 29, 2025, Vistra Corp. announced a sweeping expansion of its Texas generation capacity and a 20-year agreement to supply 1,200 MW of carbon-free nuclear power to a large, investment-grade customer, with delivery ramping up through 2032. This combination of long-term contract stability and major infrastructure investments positions Vistra to benefit from accelerating power demand and reinforces the company’s focus on grid reliability and clean energy transition. We will assess...
